text: Cho t·ª© di·ªán ƒë·ªÅu $ABCD$. L·∫•y $M, N$ l·∫ßn l∆∞·ª£t l√† trung ƒëi·ªÉm c√°c c·∫°nh $AC$ v√† $CD$. T√≠nh g√≥c gi·ªØa hai vecto $\vec{BM}$ v√† $\vec{AN}$ (ƒë∆°n v·ªã radian, k·∫øt qua l√†m tr√≤n ƒë·∫øn h√†ng ph·∫ßn trƒÉm).

Let the side length of the regular tetrahedron be $a$.

$ = \dfrac{1}{4}a^2 + \dfrac{1}{4}a^2 \cos 60^\circ - \dfrac{1}{2}a^2 \cos 60^\circ - \dfrac{1}{2}a^2 \cos 60^\circ $
